NonPII.nonPIIAccessMechanism: The data collected by the platform is stored in a PostgreSQL database and can easily be exported in CSV format

adherenceSteps: Compliance with data protection laws is handled both at the company level and on a case by case basis with our partners through data sharing agreements. We also have regular internal meetings with our Data Protection Officer to discuss compliance with applicable laws.

bestPracticesList: Most of the principles highlighted in Principles for Digital Development

preventHarm.additionalInfoMechanismProcessesPolicies: Moderation and respect of code of conducts are handled in-person trough regular meetings with our partners that use the platform.

typesOfDataCollected: Users typically bring their own data to the platform, which may include PII.
